name: Ivory seals GMTK 2021
description:
Tutorial:
- By pressing space one tick will happen. every tick the clibs (box ish things) will try to move
- by Left-clicking two clibs you will link them and they will take turn moving each other
- by Right-clicking two linked clibs you will destroy that linkage and they will now move freely.

The goal of the game is to move the rock to the star.
